# make_df

```{r examples-make_df}
df <- make_df(
  params = list(
    test = "tmt",
    test_name = "Trail Making Test",
    scale = "Trails B",
    raw_score = 55,
    score = 50,
    score_type = "t_score",
    domain = "Attention/Executive",
    subdomain = "Processing Speed",
    narrow = "Set-Shifting",
    pass = "Planning",
    verbal = "Nonverbal",
    timed = "Timed",
    mean = 50,
    stdev = 10,
    reliability = .95,
    test_type = "npsych_test"
  )
)

```
